title: Comic Anthology Toshi no Sa.
original_name: コミックアンソロジー年の差。
sinopse:
Tokeimawari no Natsuyasumi:
Ichihara and Takase are dating but recently all they do is fight. Soon there is a summer festival in their town, will Takase remember the good times before they started fighting and what has happened to Ichihara?

Include six other one-shots from different mangakas:

Mashou no Onna - ichtys
Papurika, piman, tougarashi - Yoshino Satsuki
DEAREST LOVER - Matsumoto Satoya
Change! - Tsukuda Hanna
Neko to Kemuri - Hanazawa Chika
Sensei, Ano ne - Hotta Kiichi
